feed.title: Upvote RSS Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.1.0
entry.content:
• This release adds support for Mbin: a federated content aggregator, voting, discussion and microblogging platform
  • The Docker image has been optimized and is now less than half its previous size

Full Changelog: https://github.com/johnwarne/upvote-rss/compare/v1.0.7...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.2.0
entry.content:
This release adds support for Lobsters, a computing-focused community centered around link aggregation and discussion.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/johnwarne/upvote-rss/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.2.1
entry.content:
Better comment parsing for Lobsters posts

Full Changelog: https://github.com/johnwarne/upvote-rss/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.2.2
entry.content:
• Fix bug with grabbing webpage content when it shouldn't
  • Set a different default score value per platform
  • Refactor available filters logic
  • Remove Threshold and Posts Per Day filters from Lobsters due to traffic concerns
  • Better Lobsters story description parsing

Full Changelog: https://github.com/johnwarne/upvote-rss/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.2.3
entry.content:
• Tweak front-end form debouncing and animations

Full Changelog: https://github.com/johnwarne/upvote-rss/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3
